data.title: LPC providers compared
data.meta_description:
The student’s guide to careers in the law. Gives the truth about law firms and the Bar. Based on thousands of interviews with trainees,
                                             pupils and market sources, this site offers the full package of careers advice to anyone entering the legal profession.
